dict.string: We need access to your health data to monitor your vitals for emergency detection.
We need access to your health data to store vital logs.
HealthGuard needs your location to help emergency responders find you during critical health situations.
Background location monitoring enables emergency services to locate you even when the app is not active, ensuring help can reach you during critical health events.
Always-on location is required to detect emergencies and dispatch help, even when the app is in the background.
